html:
2025-0826
2025-11-27FINBank of Canada ActAppointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of CanadaApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of Sandra Hanington of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2027, in the place of Claire Kennedy, whose term has expired.N/A
subject: Appointment of a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of Sandra Hanington of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2027, in the place of Claire Kennedy, whose term has expired.
